title: Pixel 3a lower Speaker suddenly stopped working
content:
no voice from the lower speaker, no notification voice,no alarm voice, l just got the device one month ago.
What it is strange that if i blow some air onto the speaker ther voice come back for a while with nose but then it disappears again.i got the phone in Germany and im currently in Egypt, apperently there is no support in Egypt.suggesstion!!! Im pretty lost Right now i really liked the device.i tried rebooting in safe mode, no good
